message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $60.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $55. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $65.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $58 is a more reasonable price for me. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $68.
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Alice. I think $62 is a fair price for the product. Can we shake on it?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $70.
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Alice. I think $67 is a fair price for the product. Can we finally agree on a price?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $72.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time at $69. Can we finalize the deal?
